name: Disconnected (Geqwe)
description:
Description:

A detective hunts down a serial killer on Three Sisters mountain, in Alberta, Canada, with the help of a young detective.

Controls:

WASD or Arrows to move

[M] to open map, hints and objectives

[E] to open/close flashlight

[G] to drink coffee and warm up

Change sensitivity from pause menu [Esc]

A game created by Giorgos Kletsas

SPOILER ALERT

If you liked the game, donate something for the voice actors so we can continue our cooperation in next episodes. Rate and comment for feedback.

This game was made for DevSquad Academy Jam.
